step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your hands clasped comfortably in your lap, maintaining an upright posture.
You're raising your hands well. Try to keep your elbows a little closer together as you bring your hands towards your forehead.
Nicely done spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Focus on keeping your head upright and avoiding any forward pull.
Holding the position! Remember to breathe and maintain that wide elbow stance for the full 30 seconds.
Smooth return to the starting position. Ensure your hands are clasped again in your lap.
Second rep starting strong! Keep those hands clasped and your posture tall as you begin raising them.
Good movement towards your forehead. Continue to focus on keeping the elbows relatively close at this stage.
Excellent job spreading the elbows wide behind your head again. Remember the tip to keep your head upright.
Holding steady! Maintain the stretch and keep your elbows wide. You're doing great.
Great job completing the second rep by returning smoothly to the start. You're showing good control.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your elbows close when raising your hands and spread them wide behind your head. Maintain an upright posture throughout and avoid pulling forward. Keep up the good work!
